ProductPriceRange.name: ProductPriceRange
ProductPriceRange.description: Represents the price range of a product determined by using a product selling model that’s stored in the relevant price book.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: ISO code for any currency allowed by the organization. Available only for organizations with the multicurrency feature enabled.

LastReferencedDate.description: Indicates whether the product price range has been archived (true) or not (false). This field is read-only.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Required. The name of the product price range.

OwnerId.description: The Salesforce ID of the sales representative who owns the product price range.

ProductId.description: The product for which the price range is being determined.

ProductSellingModelId.description: The product selling model used to determine the price range of the product.

RecordedPrice.description: The selected price of the product over a range of prices.
